subject: Hello
body:
Hello
To receive your Compensation.
Contact Mr. Felix Moore accountant officer In Nigeria e-mail:
(
felimoore661@gmail.com
)
I have succeeded in transferring the huge amount of funds under the
cooperation of the new partner from London okay, I traveled to Taiwan
to build a business project.
So contact him to receive 1.9million bank draft which I kept for you.
Yours Sincerely
Mr. Philips Odouza

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear Mr. Philips Odouza,

Thank you for your email. Could you please provide more details about the bank draft and the process of receiving it?

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello
This is Felix Moore, I received your email regarding the compensation
payment by Mr. Philips odouza.
The purpose of the compensation is best known to Philips because I was only
instructed to make sure you receive the $1.9m bank draft hence you have
contacted for it.
Currently the bank draft is with our bank right now and to receive it will
cost you a mailing fee about $100.00 to send it through courier in your
country address.
In case if you want to receive it through wire transfer you let me know.
Thanks and God bless
Mr. Felix Moore

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear Mr. Felix Moore,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I would prefer to receive the bank draft through a wire transfer. Could you please provide me with the necessary details to proceed with this method?

Best wishes,
David
